title: Life in the West Bank settlement of Kedem Arava: 'We're not taking anyone's place, there is only sand around us'
subhead: Established in 2017 near the Jordanian border, the Kedem Arava settlement contains prefabricated homes housing some 60 families, former city dwellers seeking a life closer to nature. While most residents deny ideological motivation, their presence fully aligns with the annexation of Palestinian territory sought by the Israeli far right.

title: Jacques Rancière, philosopher: 'Today, the people fueled by resentment manufactured by billionaires dominate the public sphere'
subhead: 'May '68 Thinkers Reflect On Trump Era' (1/6). The philosopher of emancipation examines the roots of the current reactionary offensive. He views contemporary utopian micro-communities as new ways of 'living as equals.'
